description:
Marriages

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12611 Statistics of marriages

Definition:
The term marriage refers to a civil marriage. The statistics
cover all marriages conducted by a registry office in
Germany and marriages of Germans in a foreign country
provided that these marriages were subsequently registered
in the domestic registry office at the married couple's
place of residence.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2016
name: Marriages
